Description:
Detects suspicious process command line that uses base64 encoded input for execution with a shell

Author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Linux Base64 Encoded Pipe to Shell
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%base64 %' and ((command like '%| bash %' or command like '%| sh %' or command like '%|bash %' or command like '%|sh %') and (command like '% |sh' or command like '%| bash' or command like '%| sh' or command like '%|bash')))
